java/liquibase/database/template/ArgTypePreparedStatementSetter.java

00001 package liquibase.database.template;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00004 
00005 import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
00006 import java.sql.SQLException;
00007 import java.sql.Types;
00008 import java.util.Collection;
00009 
00016 class ArgTypePreparedStatementSetter implements PreparedStatementSetter {
00017 
00018     private final Object[] args;
00019 
00020     private final int[] argTypes;
00021 
00022 
00029     public ArgTypePreparedStatementSetter(Object[] args, int[] argTypes) throws JDBCException {
00030         if ((args != null && argTypes == null) || (args == null && argTypes != null) ||
00031                 (args != null && args.length != argTypes.length)) {
00032             throw new JDBCException("args and argTypes parameters must match");
00033         }
00034         this.args = args;
00035         this.argTypes = argTypes;
00036     }
00037 
00038 
00039     public void setValues(PreparedStatement ps) throws SQLException {
00040         int argIndx = 1;
00041         if (this.args != null) {
00042             for (int i = 0; i < this.args.length; i++) {
00043                 Object arg = this.args[i];
00044                 if (arg instanceof Collection && this.argTypes[i] != Types.ARRAY) {
00045                     Collection entries = (Collection) arg;
00046                     for (Object entry : entries) {
00047                         StatementCreatorUtils.setParameterValue(ps, argIndx++, this.argTypes[i], entry);
00048                     }
00049                 } else {
00050                     StatementCreatorUtils.setParameterValue(ps, argIndx++, this.argTypes[i], arg);
00051                 }
00052             }
00053         }
00054     }
00055 
00056 
00057 }
